item.description: China observers that I follow. Author Content Lean Description Alex Lo SCMP SCMP China Lo is a columnist at the South China Morning Post, a Hong-Kong based newspaper.

item.title: China Books
item.description: China books that I have read. Politics The following books analyze China’s politics, including foreign policy, domestic policy, history, governance, and culture. Title (Author) Description Haunted by Chaos (Sulmaan Khan) Decent summary of PRC and CPC history.
